<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|int|absolute}}: An absolute height as seen on the F3 screen.
** {{nbt|int|above_bottom}}: A relative height starting at the bottom of the world.
** {{nbt|int|below_top}}: A relative height starting at the top of the world. Higher values move the height down.
</onlyinclude></div>
